name: "He Who Has No Life"
effect: When an ally with cost 5 or less enters play, destroy it.
How do you kill that which has no life?

name: A Break in the Action
effect: Exhaust any number of ready heroes and allies in your party. Each of those characters heals 2 damage from itself.

name: A Donation of Mageweave
effect:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw three cards, then discard three cards.
"Mageweave is running low, and we could use your help to replenish our stocks!" - Raedon Duskstriker

name: Abacus of Violent Odds
effect:
When your hero attacks, roll a die.
If it's even, remove your hero from combat.
If it's odd, ready your hero and all of your weapons at the end of this combat.
Once the prized possession of Pathaleon the Calculator, its odds eventually stacked against him.

name: Aldori Legacy Defender
effect: [Activate] ==> Target hero or ally has -2 ATK this turn.

name: Andiss Butcherson
effect: You pay 1 less to strike with weapons.
"My advice? Keep your scabbard greased and your blades sharp."

name: Anesthetic Poison
effect: Talent: Poison
"Poison the body, and you'll numb the mind." - The Assassin's Creed, Chapter 6

name: Angrida
effect: [Activate] ==> Angrida deals 2 shadow damage to target ally.
"Don't touch what you can't afford."

name: Arcane Blast
effect: Talent: Arcane

name: Archdruid Hamuul Runetotem
effect:
Druids in your party have +1 ATK while attacking.
Druids in your party have protector.

name: Ash'ergi
effect:
Stealth (Can't protect against this character.)
Ash'ergi has +1 ATK for each damage on him.
"Go ahead, mon. Hit me again."

name: Aspect of the Monkey
effect: Talent: Beast Mastery
Monkey see, monkey dodge.

name: Avenger's Shield
effect: Talent: Protection
Those who oppose the shield must yield.

name: Band of the Ranger-General
effect: You pay 1 less to strike with weapons for each weapon you have.

name: Battle "Preparations"
effect: Allies can't attack until after your next turn.

name: Berserker Rage
effect: Talent: Fury

name: Binding Heal
effect: Talent: Holy

name: Bitties
effect: At the end of your turn, if Bitties has damage, destroy him.

name: Blessing of Divinity
effect: Talent: Protection
"Go forward with the strength of heroes, and let foulness break itself upon the power of your mandate."

name: Bloodlust
effect: Talent: Enhancement

name: Borlis Brode
effect: Borlis Brode can't ready during your ready step.

name: Breanna Greenmother
effect: Allies in your party can use activated ([Activate] ) powers the turn they enter your party.

name: Broan Charges-the-Fight
effect:
Ferocity

name: Brother Against Brother
effect:
While you control three or more abilities, pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.
"In time, Syth had me cast out of the Halls, but he refused to let me take our sister Lakka with me. Will you help me rescue her?" - Isfar

name: Burst of Knowledge
effect: 1, Put Burst of Knowledge into its owner's hand ==> You pay 2 less to play your next card this turn.
A little knowledge can be a dangerous thing.

name: Caddrick Von Styler
effect: 5, [Activate] ==> Each player destroys one of his resources.

name: Call of the Wild
effect: Talent: Feral
To heed such a call is to forsake man-made weaponry in favor of a more feral response.

name: Celee Cogfreeze
effect: When you play an ability, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

name: Chain Heal
effect: Talent: Restoration

name: Chen Stormstout
effect:
When Chen Stormstout enters play, say "I bring PANDA-MONIUM!" and opposing allies can't attack this turn.

effect: [Activate] ==> Reveal the top card of target player's deck. You may remove that card from the game.

name: Christopher the Devout

Protector

effect:
Put Corki's Ransom into its owner's hand and pay 2 to complete this quest.

name: Corpse Run
effect: Ongoing: When an ally in your party is destroyed during your turn, you may put it from its owner's graveyard into his hand at end of turn.

effect: Ongoing: 2, [Activate] ==> Draw three cards and skip your next turn. Use only on your turn.

name: Gor'gar
effect:

effect:
When you strike with Sunfury Bow of the Phoenix, your hero has long-range this combat. (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)

name: Sus'vayin
effect: Sus'vayin has ferocity and long-range while more allies are in an opponent's party than in yours.

name: Swift Discipline
effect:
During your turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.

name: Sword of a Thousand Truths
effect: When your hero deals combat damage with Sword of a Thousand Truths to a hero, that hero's controller discards his hand.

effect: When Tempest enters play, ready a hero or ally in your party.

name: Tez Tez the Patchmonger
effect: When Tez Tez enters play, target opposing ally has -3 ATK this turn.

effect:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Target ally can't protect this turn.
"Bring me four hearts of flame and four golem oil and I shall craft the torch of flawless flame." - Kalaran Windblade

name: The Ultimate Bloodsport
effect:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.

name: Timbermaw Ally
effect:
Remove three ability cards in your graveyard from the game and pay 1 to complete this quest.

name: Timeslicer
effect: Your hero has dual wield. (Can have a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipment. Can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.)

name: Tinkmaster Overspark
effect: At the start of your turn, you may put an equipment card from your graveyard into play.

name: To Serve Kum'isha
effect:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed card with cost of 3 or more into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Tomadae the Magnificent
effect: If your hero would deal damage with an ability, it deals that much damage +1 instead.
By their very being, the draenei lend their inner strength to their allies.

name: Totem of Coo
effect:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card, then draw another card for each other quest named Totem of Coo you have.

effect: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the rest on top of your deck in any order.
